participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, she enjoys helping others and values education.
participant_1.background: I have a dogs. I attend church every week. I'm a woman. I work as a school teacher.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, he is deeply connected to his spirituality and enjoys meditation.
participant_2.background: I'm a buddhist. I live in alaska. I've not spoken in three months. I like meditation. I quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.

content.text:
Hi! 
It is nice to see you üòä
How is your day going?
Nice to meet you! I have a meditation in the morning, so my day goes very well! And what about you?
I am a bit tired. Are you a woman ?
No, a man. I live in Alaska. Where do you live?
I live in the united kingdom
You live on the island! I am a buddhist and I want to live on the island.
No, i am a stay at home mom. Do you have a dogs ?
No I have not. I have not so much time for it. I quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.
I am a teacher, but my mom is a retired woman .
I teach math and love it .
I like math. Are you a good teacher?
I am. My mom is a teacher .
